comments:
3.3 M3

We've seen intermittent occurrences of the following WID exception.
It looks like a race condition whereby the progress dialog has been closed by the time the asyncExec gets processed.

Maybe updateForSetBlocked (and updateForClearBlocked) should check for a disposed imageLabel (as is done for the messageLabel in setMessage)?
Either that or check whether the dialog has been disposed in the asyncExec runnable.
